name: SICKO MODE
description:
"Squash fruit, defend your base, GO SICKO!"

Originally made in 9 days for the Juice Game Jam with the theme "Dont Stop".

---------------

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Move faster / "Pull" the blades

---------------

Credits

Crescendo2020 - Music

Wicked Harmony - Music + SFX

JNH - Game Design + Programming
